description:
When the use of direct flags for dd/zero out operations were introduced (commit 43bc69336b10e357c4b8a8d802bfaf9e4a29157a) a bug was introduced where the dd would always be performed twice.  Once with the o_direct flags and again using the method without o_direct.

Simple indent issue.
title: Performing zero out of LVM volumes on delete twice
